attributes.action: LET US SAVE LIVES WHO LOST DURIING HOUSE FIRE  EVERY YEAR IN UK.
attributes.additional_details:
since many years i have observe that every year we are loosing more than 50 lives in uk due to house fire.
I have also noticed that mainley it happens in the night time. I want to ask the Govt to make a law that
every house must be allowed to have a fire door oppening in the backyard of the house having a small balcony to stand out in case of any happening any such event.
because if fire broke out downstaire how come you can go out from the downstair door.
i belive it will save lives and will bring a lots of income and business for UK.
i would like people to participate because it might be some one from us or from our coming generation to whome we save today....
